subject: Re: [junit] About java 1.4
msgSnippet: If you are referring to the assert() method colliding with 1.4, it has been deprecated and you should use assertTrue().  I believe this is in the documentation

If you are referring to the assert() method colliding with 1.4, it has
been deprecated and you should use assertTrue().  I believe this is in
the documentation (FAQ, to be exact -- I think).

=jason

On Thu, 2002-07-25 at 02:09, Shane Duan wrote: Can you be more
specific?  I have been working on JDK1.4 and the only 
problem I found was something realted to GUI actions.  The JUnit 
framework itself has been working well.

wenzhe lu wrote:

>Dear all,
>
>I found the junit3.7 can not work with java1.4 together.
>But it seemed that the junit3.7 is the newest version.
>How can my programes based on 1.4 work with junit now?
>
>thanks
